page.title: 11GALA DAY
page.content: Gala Day,which comes at the end of a week of festivities and competitions takes place on the first Saturday in June.On the days leading to the big event are a number of competitions e.g. football tournaments,window spotting competitions etc.Flags are hung up and house fronts decorated.The pupils of Strathaven Academy elect the Gala Queen and her Champion from among their number. The Queen is crowned at the John Hastie Museum and is surrounded by her "court" selected from the local primarys.On Saturday there is a parade of decorated floats with people in fancy dress.It starts from Station Road(where they are judged) and goes through the streets of the town.It's a knockout,ladies football ,model aircraft and various stalls are found.It usually rains.
